displayName.text: The Law Firm of John C. Clark

formattedAddress: 144 E 44th St #504, New York, NY 10017, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: The Law Firm of John C. Clark
The Law Firm of John C. Clark

adrFormatAddress: 144 E 44th St #504, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text:
John is sharp, attentive, and extremely responsive. He accepted a breach of contract case and tracked it to a successful completion, inclusive of jury trial, over the course of almost five years.

He does an unprecedented amount of research and preparation for court appearances. John spent hours explaining the trial process and taking all of my questions. Most importantly, John is confident and articulate in front of a jury. He won the case with a unanimous verdict. I highly recommend him.

originalText.text: I reached out to John with assistance in financial recovery for my claims. John was very professional and efficient in handling my matter. With his course of action, the dispute was settled and I received financial recovery in a short period of time. It was a pleasant experience given the circumstances and will certainly work with him again if a similar situation arises.

text.text: I reached out to John with assistance in financial recovery for my claims. John was very professional and efficient in handling my matter. With his course of action, the dispute was settled and I received financial recovery in a short period of time. It was a pleasant experience given the circumstances and will certainly work with him again if a similar situation arises.

originalText.text: I want to start by saying John is one of the best. With everything going on during covid and all the many other unforeseen circumstances he was on top of everything and never skipped a beat. I never had to wonder, didn’t leave me out of the loop during the process, and was highly informative about what to expect and how things work. You can tell the work is taken very seriously and it felt good to not be treated like “just another client”. John took the time to get to know me and my situation before anything and hit the ground running with making a game plan to get me to where I need to be. I honestly don’t know where I’d be had I not found him. If you find yourself in a situation where you need guidance or representation, The Law Firm of John C. Clark is most definitely the place you need to be.

originalText.text: While covid made 2020 a difficult year, suffering and recovering from a devastating injury during this same time period was even harder. I had approached several firms prior to The Law Firm of John C. Clark and found the communication to be horrible and was unsure whether I had a case. I was referred to John by a friend, who quickly filed my claim and settled my case in less than a year. I'm happy to share my experience here if it can help someone else.

text.text: While covid made 2020 a difficult year, suffering and recovering from a devastating injury during this same time period was even harder. I had approached several firms prior to The Law Firm of John C. Clark and found the communication to be horrible and was unsure whether I had a case. I was referred to John by a friend, who quickly filed my claim and settled my case in less than a year. I'm happy to share my experience here if it can help someone else.

originalText.text: I was hesitant to pursue my claim, and was very nervous about having to put myself out there. However, working with John got me to a place where I was comfortable and ultimately, I decided to pursue my case. Through the process, I felt prepared and comfortable every step of the way. Obtaining the result I had hoped for not only allowed me to move on, it allowed me to let others know that this facility was unfit to treat others. Thank you.
